abstract: Carol Kino reviews book Playing to the Gallery: Helping Contemporary Art in Its Struggle to Be Understood by Grayson Perry.
lead_paragraph: Grayson Perry attempts to illuminate the complicated contradictions of modern art and the world of dealers, collectors and tastemakers that surrounds it.

headline.main: ‘Playing to the Gallery,’ by Grayson Perry

snippet: Grayson Perry attempts to illuminate the complicated contradictions of modern art and the world of dealers, collectors and tastemakers that surrounds it.
